item.title: Viu, a service provided by Vuclip, delivers an average of 20 videos per month to viewers in Malaysia
item.description:
Vuclip, a PCCW Media company, has released key engagement data for its OTT service, Viu, based on an analysis of app and desktop viewership. ](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEiOh1EZVWoEhfM9h_KB5E2oDQtVX9NIYnObrOM6oWpK6xB_fWBVmqMwQv5MQtoq5jTe338bKg_10JMMP4wDeSWDCbwHwC8jKXx1VMXkYHCYTrGVSsm8QO-dG0eKaUelNE4fQSA8esO5InKk/s1600/image.png) Source: Viu Malaysia website. In the two months since its launch in Malaysia, Viu has seen average user engagement of 20 videos per month. Peak viewing times are after work hours, with Wednesday to Sunday being the most popular days. Korean dramas, Bollywood films, and Malaysian TV series rank among the top ten most-watched content, highlighting the strong demand for Asian entertainment...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/viu-a-service-provided-by-vuclip-delivers-an-average-of-20-videos-per-month-to-viewers-in-malaysia/
